com.pega.pegarules.pub.generator

Interface GenericAssemblerValidator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GenericAssembler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JavaGenerator, JavaGeneratorExtended

    public interface GenericAssemblerValidator
extends GenericAssembler
    The RuleBasedAssembler interface is the minimum implementation required for an assembler. This is used by generation services to frame the one assembler that dispatches to rules that implement assembly.

      • getLocalParametersName

        java.lang.String getLocalParametersName()
        Names the Local Parameters property (a PageList of Embed-MethodParams) in the Rule- class associated with this instance, if any. Return a null or empty String to indicate that no such property is included in this Rule- class.
        Returns:
        name, if any, of Local Parameters property

      • getPagesAndClassesName

        java.lang.String getPagesAndClassesName()
        Names the Pages&Classes property (a PageList of Embed-PagesAndClasses) in the Rule- class associated with this instance, if any. Return a null or empty String to indicate that no such property is included in this Rule- class.
        Returns:
        name, if any, of Pages&Classes property

      • getParametersName

        java.lang.String getParametersName()
        Names the Parameters property (a PageList of Embed-MethodParams) in the Rule- class associated with this instance, if any. Return a null or empty String to indicate that no such property is included in this Rule- class.
        Returns:
        name, if any, of Parameters property
